thread.title: Ghana star Andre Ayew going through intensive knee treatment to be ready for Stoke City clash
thread.title_full: Ghana star Andre Ayew going through intensive knee treatment to be ready for Stoke City clash

title: Ghana star Andre Ayew going through intensive knee treatment to be ready for Stoke City clash
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Ghana star Andre Ayew going through intensive knee treatment to be ready for Stoke City clash - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew is going through intensive knee treatment to get him ready for Stoke City clash 
Andre Ayew and Jonjo Shelvey are both on course for Swansea City’s meeting with Stoke City even though both players are carrying knee problems. 
Ayew has withdrawn from the Ghana squad for their friendly against Canada next week after taking a bang to the knee during Swansea’s draw with Tottenham last weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
